Title: Viessmann installs 19 heat pumps at FC Bayern Munich’s Allianz Arena
Summary: As part of its ongoing sustainability efforts, FC Bayern Munich has partnered with Viessmann Climate Solutions, a subsidiary of Carrier Corporation, to install 19 new heat pumps at the Allianz Arena.
